projects.title: Superhero Team Inspector
projects.description: This app that lets you create a fake superheroes team to easely see their combined powerstats. Credentials to access: Email: challenge@alkemy.org Password: react.

projects.title: Blog Managment
projects.description: This is a simple blog managment app. It allows you to create, edit and delete posts. It uses React, Redux, and {JSON} Placeholder fake endpoint.

projects.title: Trivia
projects.description: As part of the Evuca project we were assigned the task of creating a website in which to apply the knowledge acquired so far. This results in a strengthen our use of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. We use Webpack, Git and Less on this proyect. It is a simple trivia game with achievements.

projects.title: Hero NFT
projects.description: Landing page for NFT transactions. This was created to train the use of NextJs and Sass.

projects.title: Its Raining
projects.description: React based weather seeker. It consumes a free openweathermap API. I used CreateReactApp, React Router and Styled Components.

projects.title: Temperature and Humidity Simulator
projects.description: Scienceless simulation of how temperature and humidity affect to bunch of a computer generated slimes. My frist thougths for this project was practice with Objects and Classes, but I also learned about physics and how to manipulate css variables.

projects.title: ETCH-A-SKETCH
projects.description: ETCH-A-SKETCH game with some extra functionalities. Currently just works on desktop.
